vote.title: Authorize an Interlocal Agreement between the City of Dallas and Dallas Area Rapid Transit to provide “on-demand” transportation services for the residents of the Joppa neighborhood utilizing DART’s ”on-demand” transportation services to six destinations and during the construction of a pedestrian bridge over the Union Pacific Railroad tracks that parallel the existing Linfield vehicular bridge from Fall 2020 to Fall 2023 - Not to exceed $500,000.00 - Financing: Transportation Special Projects Fund
vote.description: Authorize an Interlocal Agreement between the City of Dallas and Dallas Area Rapid Transit to provide “on-demand” transportation services for the residents of the Joppa neighborhood utilizing DART’s ”on-demand” transportation services to six destinations and during the construction of a pedestrian bridge over the Union Pacific Railroad tracks that parallel the existing Linfield vehicular bridge from Fall 2020 to Fall 2023 - Not to exceed $500,000.00 - Financing: Transportation Special Projects Fund
